findings.title: Owner can mint any amounts of tokens before transferring ownership to MasterChef
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to mint any amount of tokens before transferring ownership to MasterChef.

findings.title: Owner can change fee rate and address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the fee rate and address.

findings.title: Owner can add fee whitelist addresses
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to add fee whitelist addresses.

findings.title: Owner can add/remove dex pairs
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to add or remove DEX pairs without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can add/remove minters
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to add or remove minters without any restrictions.

findings.title: Minters can mint any amounts to any address
findings.description: Minters have unrestricted access to mint tokens to any address without limitations.
